spec_data.Name: perl-Module-Install-Repository
spec_data.Description:
Module::Install::Repository is a Module::Install plugin to automatically
figure out repository URL and set it via repository() which then will be
added to resources under META.yml.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:25:07 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Automatically sets repository URL from Svn/Svk/Git checkout
